title: Gut rehabbed 3 bedroom 2 bath in Bronzeville
posting_body: Gut rehabbed beautiful, spacious 3 beds 2 bath units!
Classic Chicago vintage building features preserved, hardwood floors and modern updates and finishes throughout!
Located in the heart of Bronzeville, right by Harold Washing Cultural Center.
Easy to park neighborhood with tree lined streets.
Near popular neighborhood gem, Sip and Savor Cafe.
Close to 90/94 and Green & Blue Line CTA train & bus.
All new GORGEOUS and massive 3 Beds 2 Baths with classic Chicago vintage features preserved!
You will have 1st occupancy!
Featuring:
*In-unit laundry
*Central heat & AC
*All new stainless steel appliances
*Dishwasher & microwave
*Large living room & large separate dining room
*King size primary bedroom with queen size 2nd and 3rd bedroom
*Decorative vintage fireplace with built in bookcases
*Refinished original hardwood flooring throughout
*All new baths with full sized bathtub and built in shelving
*Great closet space
*Lots of windows flood the space with natural light
All New Rehab building featuring garden, 1st and top floor units available for August & September move ins!
Photos may be stock of another unit in the building.
All similar layout and finishes.
Fireplaces are all unique~ super cool!
Tandem outdoor parking spots in rear of building - 1st come 1st serve, unassigned, no fee!
Water included.
Tenant pays all other utilities.
Security deposit or move in fee may apply.
To qualify, owner asks for 625 credit, income 3 times the rent, no evictions, and no bankruptcies.
All adults must apply and qualify.
Co-signers accepted.
Unsure?
I am a residential leasing agent that can help put you in the home of your dreams at no cost to you.
Contact me with what you are looking for, and let's find you that dream home!
